name: syncronization_tool.exe
description:
Welcome to Paragon Industries! As you may know, we are currently developing a new technology that can change the course of reality... This is where you come along! After many hours of work we finally created something so powerful that can change the life as we knew it. Features: High action gameplay filled with amazing tunes! Tones of lore and secrets to find! The beginning of a outstanding journey. Patch notes (version 1.0.0): - The connection was made stronger. - Stability was improved - Tones of new features - Removed Č̵̩h̶̟͌ả̷͖ŕ̴̡l̶̺͐ò̷͍ť̶͎ť̶͍e̴̖͘ Paragon Industries offers you, our brave testers a big:
From us, and from the rest of the world. Always remember: You make the world shine brighter!

= Stuck at the tutorial? = 

* Look, I get it. The fight can be hard for some people. That is intentional. * I suggest persevering to actually finish it. * But I also understand that this can take too long so here it's a work-around.

= How to skip the tutorial boss = 1. Press both the windows key button and the "R" key 2. It should open up the "Run" window. 3. In that window copy paste the following %localappdata% and then press enter. 4. Look for a folder called CCC_Jam and open it. 5. Double click on void_data.ini (if the ini part doesn't show up don't worry it's not a problem.) 6. Add this next line of text: Tutorial="1.000000" 7. Save the file and open up the game. 8. If you don't see a void_data file then dm me and i will send you the file.
